quote: Why grab possessions like thieves, or divide them like socialists, when you can ignore them like wise men?
author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quote: Love is the total absence of fear. Love asks no questions. Its natural state is one of extension and expansion, not comparison and measurement.
author: Gerald G. Jampolsky

quote: If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts but if he will be content to begin with doubts he shall end in certainties.
author: Francis Bacon
